nodes.text: A Sith Destroyer was a capital ship used by the Sith during the New Sith Wars.
The ship type was armed with at least a broadside laser cannon artillery and could overpower several battleships.
One such vessel was the Nightfall, Lord Kaan's flagship. It led a fleet of Corsair battleships and Sith Dreadnaughts in the First Battle of Ruusan.
